---
title: "Publications"
---

```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(DT)

# Read dataset
data <- read.csv("data/publications.csv")
data$Date <- lubridate::dmy(data$Date)


# Render the table with sorting, filtering, and pagination
datatable(
  data,
  escape = FALSE,
  rownames = FALSE,
  options = list(
    pageLength = 10,        # Display 5 rows per page
    autoWidth = TRUE,      # Adjust column width
    searchHighlight = TRUE, # Highlight search results
    order = list(list(3, "asc"))  # Default sort by 'Date' column (ascending)
  ),
  class = "display"
)

```
